scripts.interface:dev: concurrently "yarn types-watch" "DESTINATION=github yarn workspace interface dev"
scripts.desktop:dev: concurrently "yarn types-watch" "yarn interface:start" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && yarn workspace desktop dev"
scripts.desktop:package: yarn types-copy && cross-env DESTINATION=desktop yarn workspace interface build && yarn workspace desktop package
scripts.desktop:make: yarn types-copy && cross-env DESTINATION=desktop yarn workspace interface build && yarn workspace desktop make --verbose
scripts.server-web:run: yarn types-copy && cross-env DESTINATION=server-web yarn workspace interface build && yarn workspace server-web build && yarn workspace server-web start
scripts.typecheck: yarn workspace interface typecheck && yarn workspace desktop typecheck
scripts.github-page: cross-env DESTINATION=github yarn workspace interface build && gh-pages -d dist-interface-github
